nodes.text: The Predators is an adventure for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game. It is written by Owen K.C. Stevens and illustrated by Adam Hughes. It was designed as a fast-play adventure for beginners and printed in the second issue of Star Wars Gamer.

Jedi Master Ali-Vor sends his Padawan to investigate rumors of smuggler activity near the city of Theed. Rann recruits his fellow classmates Arani Korden, Galak, and Rorworr to help him. On their mission, they find that the rumors are true, and that the smugglers have created a base inside some old ruins. The group defeats the band of smugglers and their leader.
